DOC.brief_summary: This randomize controlled trial evaluate pattern use health outcome ShapeUp Empower online program without financial incentive program engagement .
DOC.criteria: Age 1870 year Body mass index ( BMI ) 25 45 kg/m2 English speaking Have access Internet via computer smartphone compatible Empower Commercial Apps , basic knowledge use technology . Agree share data enter Empower Commercial Apps intervention system . Agree ShapeUp 's privacy policy user agreement . Report health problem make weight loss unsupervised exercise unsafe unreasonable Report heart condition , chest pain period activity rest , loss consciousness Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire Are currently pregnant breastfeeding , intend become pregnant next 12 month Are plan move outside great Providence area within next 12 month Report cognitive physical limitation preclude use personal computer Have participate study conduct WCDRC past 2 year Have follow commercial weightloss program within previous 6 month currently follow commercial weight loss program Weight loss â‰¥ 5 % initial body weight last 6 month History clinically diagnose eat disorder exclude Binge Eating Disorder . Previous surgical procedure weight loss Currently take weight loss medication\ Treatment cancer within last 6 month Have medical psychological condition , life situation , would make participation weight loss program inadvisable opinion principal investigator .
